name: Ant Destroyer 2 FREE
description:
Smash with your fingers all ants that exit on the hole. Tap all the ants that appear on the screen with your fingers, before they leave the screen be very careful don't tap the red ants, they are very dangerous. You have in this awesome App seven modality to smash all the Ants that you see on the screen. All you can have a game of ants is in "Ant Destroyer 2" easy to play hard to stop. Have fun with this great game.
**************************************************************
Key Features:
• Very very easy to play
• Nice 3D pre rendered graphics
• Amazing 3D realistic animations
• Seven different gameplay modality
• Seven Game Center Leaderboards
• Endless gameplay modality for kids
• Very great game for kids and babies
• Cool ambience nature music
• In Slasher/Weight modality mega "combo" bonus
• In Defense very innovative gameplay
• Different backgrounds
**************************************************************
All that you can expect from a game of Ants is: "Ant destroyer 2"
